name: Skeli Godot port
description:
SKELI (Godot port)

This is just me trying to port my old and unfinished game which I was making in Game Maker: Studio.

This time I'm using Godot engine. For now it's only first room (not even final one) just for testing purposes.

Skeli is platform game inspired by oldschool titles  as Preliminary Monty and Montezuma's Revenge. By no any means it's innovative game. It's just me making my dream come true. Making a game :)

To play just click in game window when it finish loading and use arrow keys to move around :)
